leaveGameConfirm.title: Leave Game
leaveGameConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to leave the current game?
leaveGameConfirm.rejoinInfo: You can rejoin anytime with this code:

ory.4000034: The password has been found in data breaches and must no longer be used.
ory.4010001: The login flow expired {expired_at_unix_since_minutes} minutes ago, please try again.

gameNotFound.title: Game not found
gameNotFound.description: The game you are trying to join does not exist

gameSettings.maxBots: Too many bot players selected. At least one human player is required.
gameSettings.invalidValue: Invalid value for the selected winning condition

forbidden.title: Access Denied
forbidden.description: You don't have permission to perform this action

validation.title: Invalid Input
validation.description: Please check your input and try again

server.title: Server Error
server.description: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later

create.title: Create Game
create.description: Create a new custom game with different settings

config.meAndFriendVsBots: Me and a friend vs 2 bots
config.meAndBotVsFriendAndBot: Me and a bot vs a friend and a bot

configDescription.playerBotVsPlayerBot: Player and Bot vs Player and Bot

prompt.title: Logout
prompt.text: As guest user, all your data will be lost after logging out. Are you sure you want to continue?

signup.title: Sign-up
signup.guestProfileInfo:
The Guest-Profile ist only on this device available.
 Can be converted to a real account at any time.

header.title: Our beloved national cardgame — modernized
header.description: No installation, no ads and free. Or as we say in swissgerman: De foiver und s'Weggli

features.title: Yass Features
features.subtitle: Card mats and wooden tile backgrounds are reserved for the pub.

earlyBird.title: Early Bird
earlyBird.description: Yass is still heavily under construction. Join from the start and help shape development in the right direction with your feedback.

noAds.title: Open Source
noAds.description: Yass is open source, ad-free and you can play at no cost. If you find a bug, I'd love your pull request!

fastSimple.title: Fast & Simple
fastSimple.description: Intuitive interface, quick response times and multi-language support - that's my goal for Yass.

humbleBeginnings.title: How this all started
humbleBeginnings.abstract: A couple of Jass enthusiasts got tired of playing on outdated platforms. So we built something better. This is the story of why Yass exists.

architecture.title: How it works (nerd stuff)
architecture.abstract: Interested in how it's built? Read about the tech behind Jass—real-time updates, clean architecture, and why we chose what we chose.
